movies.title: Das Pferd auf dem Balkon
movies.plot: The boy Mika suffers from Asperger's and finds it difficult to communicate and make friends. Then he sees a real horse on his neighbour's balcony. He feeds the animal apples and starts making friends with it. The horse's owner owes money and the horse has to be hidden from his ruthless creditors. Dana, an Indian girl from Mika's school, shares his love for the horse, and they have various adventures through their efforts to save the horse from slaughter and the ruthless creditors of its owner. For the first time in his life Mika has a real friend.

biography.bio: Enzo Gaier was born on June 5, 2002 in Vienna, Lower Austria, Austria. He is an actor, known for Das Pferd auf dem Balkon (2012), Die Stille danach (2016) and Die Fremde und das Dorf (2014).
biography.name: Enzo Gaier

biography.bio: It looks like we don't have any Biography for Natasa Paunovic yet.
biography.name: Natasa Paunovic

biography.bio: Nora Tschirner was born on June 12, 1981 in East Berlin, East Germany as Nora Marie Tschirner. She is an actress and producer, known for Rabbit Without Ears (2007), Kebab Connection (2004) and Sternenfänger (2002).
biography.name: Nora Tschirner

biography.bio: Andreas Kiendl was born on December 31, 1975 in Graz, Styria, Austria. He is an actor, known for SOKO Kitzbühel (2001), Die Vaterlosen (2011) and The Unintentional Kidnapping of Mrs. Elfriede Ott (2010).
biography.name: Andreas Kiendl

biography.bio: Bibiane Zeller was born on February 25, 1928 in Vienna, Austria. She is an actress, known for Julia - Eine ungewöhnliche Frau (1999), Die Ameisenstraße (1995) and Die Spätzünder (2010).
biography.name: Bibiane Zeller

biography.bio: Ernst Stankovski was born on June 16, 1928 in Vienna-Hernals, Austria as Ernst Friedel Rudolf Stankovsky. He is an actor, known for The Good Soldier Schweik (1960), Himmelsschlüssel (1991) and Bubusch (1962). He has been married to Anna Luise Schubert since 1961. They have one child. He was previously married to Ida Krottendorf.
biography.name: Ernst Stankovski

biography.bio: Branko Samarovski was born on July 9, 1939 in Zemun, Serbia, Yugoslavia. He is an actor, known for The White Ribbon (2009), North Face (2008) and 71 fragments d'une chronologie du hasard (1994).
biography.name: Branko Samarovski

biography.bio: Murathan Muslu was born on November 7, 1981 in Vienna, Austria. He is an actor, known for Ertan ou la destinée (2014), Une seconde femme (2012) and Blood Glacier (2013).
biography.name: Murathan Muslu

biography.bio: Alexander E. Fennon is an actor, known for The Debt (2010), Woman in Gold (2015) and Vienna Waits for You (2012).
biography.name: Alexander E. Fennon
